统计数值 Statistic.prefix: antd Statistic statistic 统计数值

import: import { Statistic, Row, Col, Button } from 'antd';

body.element:
<Row gutter={16}>
    <Col span={12}>
      <Statistic title="Active Users" value={112893} />
    </Col>
    <Col span={12}>
      <Statistic title="Account Balance (CNY)" value={112893} precision={2} />
      <Button style={{
      marginTop: 16
    }} type="primary">
        Recharge
      </Button>
    </Col>
    <Col span={12}>
      <Statistic title="Active Users" value={112893} loading />
    </Col>
  </Row>
